name: revenge
content:

B2 harm done to someone as a punishment for harm that they have done to someone else: She took/got/exacted (her) revenge on him for leaving her by smashing up his car. He is believed to have been shot by a rival gang in revenge for the shootings last week.
More examplesFewer examplesIt's the story of a woman who plots a dastardly revenge on her unfaithful lover.He needed to satisfy his desire for revenge.Her jilted boyfriend has sworn revenge on her new husband.You must cast aside all thoughts of revenge.The central character is a malevolent witch out for revenge.
